TP_sharing.purpose_mentioned_in_text: We may send your personal information to other group companies, affiliates and third parties to help us process your personal information for the purposes set out in this policy
TP_sharing.third_party_sharing_practice_mentioned_i: We may send your personal information to other group companies, affiliates and third parties

TP_sharing.purpose_mentioned_in_text: may also use your information for their own marketing purposes
TP_sharing.third_party_sharing_practice_mentioned_i: Our distributors may also use your information for their own marketing purposes

TP_sharing.purpose_mentioned_in_text: may also share your information with selected third parties (other than our third-party vendors or distributors) for joint marketing purposes
TP_sharing.third_party_sharing_practice_mentioned_i: may also share your information with selected third parties

TP_sharing.purpose_mentioned_in_text: Your information may be transferred to successor organization if, for example, we transfer the ownership or operation of this Site to another organization or if we merge with another organization
TP_sharing.third_party_sharing_practice_mentioned_i: Your information may be transferred to successor organization

TP_sharing.purpose_mentioned_in_text: We may disclose your information when we, in good faith, believe disclosure is appropriate to comply with the law, a court order or a subpoena

TP_name.third_party_sharing_practice_mentioned_i: we might share our server logs, which contain visitors IP addresses, with the appropriate investigative authorities
